  <title>Educational  institutions of Uganda</title>
  <abstract>The data contains 21484 schools which are classified into non-formal, other, post primary, secondary and tertiary.

To show general location of schools and other educational institutions in Uganda for the assessment of access to education. Update 2011 

The data contains 21484 schools which are classified into non-formal, other, post primary, secondary and tertiary.

The original data has coordinates in two different projections which have been displayed into a single GIS shapefile. These coordinates have been converted to be all in the same projection.</abstract>
